name: With the Wind
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Wilderness © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: You create eddies in the air around the subject that protect it from being checked or blown away. The target can't be moved by winds of less than windstorm force unless it wishes to be.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你在目标周围的空气中创造涡流，保护他不被检定或吹走。目标不能被小于暴风级的风力所移动，除非他希望如此。 伽瑟兰法术（GATHLAIN SPELLS） 伽瑟兰可以使用以下法术。
